Article.ArticleTitle: Unexpected urological presentation of COVID-19 in a 41-year-old female: A case report.

AbstractText: Hematuria and urinary discomfort may be the first manifestations of COVID-19 infection. Nevertheless, more researches are needed to be done in this field to clarify the exact mechanism by which SARS-CoV-2 affects the urological system.
